articles.title: Surgical Lights Market to grow by USD 461.45 million from 2022 to 2027, North America to account for 32% of market growth- Technavio
articles.description: NEW YORK, Sept. 14, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- The surgical lights market is expected to grow by USD 461.45 million from 2022 to 2027. In addition, the momentum of the market will progress at a CAGR of 4.8% during the forecast period, according to Technavio Researc…
